text: According to Jim is an American television sitcom. It stars Jim Belushi as a suburban father of three children (five children starting with the season- seven finale). It originally ran on ABC from October 1, 2001 to June 2, 2009. == Other websites == * Category:2001 American television series debuts Category:2009 American television series endings Category:2000s American television series Category:American sitcoms Category:Television series about dysfunctional families Category:Television series about marriage Category:Television series about siblings Category:Television series about suburbia Category:Television series set in Chicago Category:English-language television programs Category:ABC network series
title: According to Jim
